alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 12:36PM MST until January 06 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected to develop this afternoon. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Fort Collins. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Travel may become very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall on roadways. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip. org

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
